SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AlphabetSanitizer
Helper class to sanitize topic strings from any characters that might be incompatible with filesystem or URL-encoding.
DateAndTopicPollIdGenerator
Extension of the PollIdGenerator abstract class.
ExternalIpResolver
IP resolver implementation rthat looks up public IP address (access point), used by this machine.
Hyphenizer
Utils class to help convert strings into resource / file system friendly format.
IpResolver
Common interface for all IP resolvers.
LocalIpResolver
Helper class to look up LAN IP address of this local machine, if and only if the LAN is connected to the internet.
LocalResourceEncoder
Helper class to build unique http resource strings.
Poll
Represents all static and dynmically collected data of a poll.
PollController
REST Controller to register votes caused by scanning of QR codes.
PollIdGenerator
PollIdGenerator interface.
PollLauncher
Main launcher class.
PollManager
Spring component responsible for storage of all polls, no matter if ongoing or terminated.
QrImageGenerator
Helper class for all functionality related to QR code generating.
SourceChecker
Helper class to verify source (IP) of an API / WebUI caller.
WebControllers
Thymeleaf endpoint for all web controllers, is to say all resources that forward to a thymeleaf template and are strictly non-REST.
